channel.title: 精霊蜻蛉（Spirit Dragon Fly）
channel.description:
[https://youtu.be/TF-wtriQwcI](https://youtu.be/TF-wtriQwcI)
This is a work I made before, but please give it a try. The song is sung in a fictionalized, made-up language.
精霊蜻蛉 Spirit Dragon Fly
歌・歌詞 ruha music 作曲 Takashi Inamasu
-----------------------------------------
erukae ye mitama rei 胞る還帰へ依御霊玲 megrite kishi hino motoe 巡りて着し日出処(ヒノモト)ヘ mukaeya mukae okuriya 迎へ舎迎へ葬り舎 erukae ye mitama rei 胞る還帰へ依御霊玲 megrite kishi hino motoe 巡りて着し日出処(ヒノモト)ヘ erukae ye mitama rei 胞る還帰へ依御霊玲 mukaeya okuriya 迎へ舎葬り舎 haneno seni owarete 翅の背に背負われて funeya hanaya reiya nagaru 欆や花や霊や流る kigiya yamaya reiya mukae 樹々や山々御霊や迎え funeya hanaya reiya nagaru 欆や花や霊や流る kigiya yamaya reiya 樹々や山々霊や erukae ye mitama rei 胞る還帰へ依御霊玲 megrite kishi hino motoe 巡りて着し日出処(ヒノモト)ヘ erukae ye mitama rei 胞る還帰へ依御霊玲 megrite kishi hino motoe 巡りて着し日出処(ヒノモト)ヘ mukaeya mukae okuriya 迎え舎迎え葬り舎
-----------------------------------------

item.title: 精霊蜻蛉（Spirit Dragon Fly）
item.dc:creator: Takashi
item.description:
https://youtu.be/TF-wtriQwcI

This is a work I made before, but please give it a try.
The song is sung in a fictionalized, made-up language.

精霊蜻蛉 Spirit Dragon Fly

歌・歌詞 ruha music
作曲 Takashi Inamasu

erukae ye mitama rei
胞る還帰へ依御霊玲
megrite kishi hino motoe
巡りて着し日出処(ヒノモト)ヘ
mukaeya mukae okuriya
迎へ舎迎へ葬り舎

胞る還帰へ依御霊玲
megrite kishi hino motoe
巡りて着し日出処(ヒノモト)ヘ

mukaeya okuriya

haneno seni owarete
翅の背に背負われて
funeya hanaya reiya nagaru
欆や花や霊や流る
kigiya yamaya reiya mukae
樹々や山々御霊や迎え
